text: The eleventh season of Big Brother Suomi premiered on 1 September 2019 and was aired on Jim and Nelonen. This is the first season to air on Jim and Nelonen after the first ten seasons aired on Sub from 2005–2014. After a five year hiatus the revival of Big Brother Suomi was announced on 14 January 2019 alongside the revival of the Polish edition of Big Brother. On 9 July 2019, it was announced Elina Kottonen returned to host the main show. Daily Show co- host by Kimmo Vehviläinen and Alma Hätönen. For this season, the Big Brother house is located next to the shopping centre Redi in Kalasatama, Helsinki. Saved |Tarina Timo Most votes |Mira Ville Most votes |Tarina Ville Most votes |Jukka Ville Most votes |Kevin Kristian |Anu Helmeri |Milla Ville |Kimmo |Jukka & Mira 68% to save |Jukka 3 of 7 votes to evict |Anu 33,7% Ville 33.4% |Kristian 49.1% to evict |Anu 50.9% to save | colspan="2" style="background:#73fb76" | Kristian 57% to win |} ===Note=== *: Ville was safe from nomination after winning immunity from the weekly task and an advantage in next week's task. *: All housemates are facing the public vote. After the first day, 2 housemates with the most save votes are safe. Then the second day, 2 housemates with the most save votes are safe. Voting continues every day, and finally, on Thursday's show, housemates would be informed which three are up for eviction. The votes would be reset and the last public vote would be open from Thursday evening to Sunday evening. One housemate would be evicted from the house during the eviction show. *: Nominations for Week 6 are fake and all nominations would be published to housemates. The public was given the power to nominate. The two housemates with the most votes were nominated (Jukka - 28%, Mira - 27 %), and the remaining housemates would select which of the two housemates they would like to evict. *: Housemates were able to reduce nomination points by using their inhouse money. Helmeri bought -2 points for himself. Anu bought -1 point for herself and -1 point for Kristian. *: Helmeri won immunity from "stay inside the box" competition. However, Jukka and Kristian were directly nominated for eviction by Big Brother due to serious rule violations. *: Kevin won extra nomination point to give from the public vote. *: For the final week, the public were voting for who they wanted to win, rather than save. == Nominations Points Received == {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%; text-align:center; line-height:13px; width: 100%" ! style="width: 5%;" | ! style="width: 5%;" | ! style="width: 5%;" | ! style="width: 5%;" | ! style="width: 5%;" | ! style="width: 5%;" | ! colspan="2" style="width: 10%;" | ! style="width: 5%;" | ! style="width: 5%;" | ! style="width: 5%;" | ! style="width: 5%;" | ! style="width: 5%;" | |- !
